reviewText: to put it bluntly, this was a gift to my brother. he loves it and watches it often but i've never seen it and never will.
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind

reviewText: Sex and the Teenage Mind is the epitome of everything bad in a teenage sex comedy. It's like a bad version of Fast Times At Ridgemont High. It's not remotely funny and is just plain annoying. A waste of 90 minutes of your life.
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind

reviewText: I made the mistake of thinking that this movie might be funny. It wasn't. I'd hoped that Danica McKellar would be more involved in the plot. She wasn't. All in all a bad movie. So bad in fact that it's embarassing to watch it.
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind

reviewText: First, be aware the editorial review above is written by the marketers of the DVD, and is not an actual review.It's a very thin and basic-plotted movie - virgin boy wants to get laid. The End.Not only is it poorly done and essentially worthless even ignoring the high price (twice as much when new), it has even more things that bug me:1. As is the common practice in bad movies, mid-twenty year olds are playing high school students. 2. In the "special features" are a couple "deleted" scenes which are really just a few seconds more added on to identical scenes in the movie that in one case show 3 seconds of an average-looking female's natural bare breasts, and in another case, 3 seconds of an above-average female's fake-and-kinda-nasty-lookin' bare breasts. Oh, and another had 3 seconds of a bare male butt. There you go.I gave it a star because Danica McKellar is hard to find in movies and she has a couple sort-of-funny minute's-worth of screen time, some in underwear.If you like farts, farting or jokes about farts or farting, masturbation or jokes about masturbation, or perhaps farting while masturbating, then you could add another star.
summary: Bad, even for a Danica fan
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind

reviewText: The DVD, Sex and the Teenage Mind, is a good teenage gift. Was it a great movie, no, but for the price it was perfect. It came in great condition. Thanks!
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind

reviewText: I like Allison Lange, she's a good actress, but the movie was just so so. Actually got bored.  Just a silly movie, brainless.
Title: Sex And The Teenage Mind
